data.message: Narrate Duro evolution story from Day 1 to Day 10: Reconstructed full timeline from archives and artifacts: naming (Feb 10) → orchestration layer (Feb 11-12) → feedback loops (Feb 12-14) → design intelligence (Feb 14-15) → roadmap (Feb 15-16) → pivot to code/dev tooling (Feb 17-18) → 7-layer security hardening (Feb 18-19). Growth: 0→1959 artifacts, 0→86 decisions, 0→32 skills, 0→7 security layers.
